name: A.R.C Alien raid combat
description:
Assemble your best team to be able to pass the challenges, use the harmony between towers that attack and others that only slow down the enemy.

Defeating enemies earns you more points to buy more towers to withstand the waves.

At each completed stage the enemies will evolve and change their characteristics, thus making the experience more challenging.

It is a casual game with classic Tower defense mechanics that will work your logic and decision making.
